p.d: A young widow, Mathilde rears her three children alone. An executive in a major company, for several months she has suffered brutal harassment from her boss. Thibault, an emergency physician, decides to break up with Lila, unable to stand her indifference. The paths of these two unhappy individuals soon cross. Directed by: Philippe Harel (France, 2014) Screenplay: Philippe Harel, based on the novel by Delphine de Vigan Cast: Marie-Sophie Ferdane (Mathilde), Mehdi Nebbou (Thibault), Éric Savin (Jacques Pelletier), Sandrine Le Berre (Laetitia), Carolina Jurczak (Lila), Aurélia Petit (Patricia Lethu) Genre: drama Awards: Best one-off drama, Best actress (Marie-Sophie Ferdane), Festival des Créations Télévisuelles in Luchon 2015; Jérôme Minet award, Fipa 2015
